paper.title: BIP: A new protocol designed for high performance networking on myrinet

author.org: LHPC & INRIA ReMaP - LIGIM bat710, UCB-Lyon

paper.abstract: High speed networks are now providing incredible performances. Software evolution is slow and the old protocol stacks are no longer adequate for these kind of communication speed. When band-width increases, the latency should decrease as much in order to keep the system balance. With the current network technology, the main bottleneck is most of the time the software that makes the interface between the hardware and the user.
